  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92900</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92900</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Taille et orbite des satellites</string>
            <string language="en">Height and orbit of satellites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe und Bahn der Satelliten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Altura e órbita dos satélites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Altezza ed orbita dei satelliti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύψος και τροχιά των δορυφόρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Altura y órbita de satélites</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce graphe représente la  dépendance de la période d'orbite du satellite avec sa hauteur relative à la surface de la Terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This graphs shows the dependence of the satellite's period of orbit with its height relative to the Earth's surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">hauteur</string>
            <string language="en">Height</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellite</string>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses stellt Erscheinen die Abhängigkeit der 
Periode des Satelliten der Bahn mit seiner Höhe im Verhältnis zu der
Oberfläche der Masse graphisch dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto representa graficamente mostras a 
dependência do período do satélite da órbita com sua altura 
relativo à superfície da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò rappresenta graficamente le esposizioni la 
dipendenza del periodo del satellite dell'orbita con la relativa 
altezza riguardante la superficie della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό δίνει με γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει την 
εξάρτηση της περιόδου του δορυφόρου τροχιάς με το ύψος του 
σχετικά με τη γήινη επιφάνεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto representa demostraciones gra'ficamente la 
dependencia del período del satélite de la órbita con su altura 
concerniente a la superficie de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satellit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Altura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">satélite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Altezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύψος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δορυφόρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Altura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">satélite</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
